LevelLanguage.name: RU_EASY_1
LevelLanguage.Sentence: Меня зовут Кира Йошикагэ. Мне 33 года. Мой дом находится в северо-восточной части Морио, в районе поместий.

LevelLanguage.name: EN_EASY_1
LevelLanguage.Sentence: Hi! Nice to meet you! My name is John Smith. I am 19 and a student in college. I go to college in New York. My favorite courses are Geometry, French, and History.

LevelLanguage.name: EN_EASY_2
LevelLanguage.Sentence: This app wrote on C# WPF. You can play in game, show history and result and add sentances
